5 namespace voxblox {
6 
7 TsdfIntegratorBase::Ptr TsdfIntegratorFactory::create(
8  const std::string& integrator_type_name,
9  const TsdfIntegratorBase::Config& config, Layer<TsdfVoxel>* layer) {
10  CHECK(!integrator_type_name.empty());
11 
12  int integrator_type = 1;
13  for (const std::string& valid_integrator_type_name :
14  kTsdfIntegratorTypeNames) {
15  if (integrator_type_name == valid_integrator_type_name) {
16  return create(static_cast<TsdfIntegratorType>(integrator_type), config,
17  layer);
18  }
19  ++integrator_type;
20  }
21  LOG(FATAL) << "Unknown TSDF integrator type: " << integrator_type_name;
22 }
23 
24 TsdfIntegratorBase::Ptr TsdfIntegratorFactory::create(
25  const TsdfIntegratorType integrator_type,
26  const TsdfIntegratorBase::Config& config, Layer<TsdfVoxel>* layer) {
27  CHECK_NOTNULL(layer);
28  switch (integrator_type) {
29  case TsdfIntegratorType::kSimple:
30  return TsdfIntegratorBase::Ptr(new SimpleTsdfIntegrator(config, layer));
31  break;
32  case TsdfIntegratorType::kMerged:
33  return TsdfIntegratorBase::Ptr(new MergedTsdfIntegrator(config, layer));
34  break;
35  case TsdfIntegratorType::kFast:
36  return TsdfIntegratorBase::Ptr(new FastTsdfIntegrator(config, layer));
37  break;
38  default:
39  LOG(FATAL) << "Unknown TSDF integrator type: "
40  << static_cast<int>(integrator_type);
41  break;
42  }
43  return TsdfIntegratorBase::Ptr();
44 }
45 
46 // Note many functions state if they are thread safe. Unless explicitly stated
47 // otherwise, this thread safety is based on the assumption that any pointers
48 // passed to the functions point to objects that are guaranteed to not be
49 // accessed by other threads.
50 
51 TsdfIntegratorBase::TsdfIntegratorBase(const Config& config,
52  Layer<TsdfVoxel>* layer)
53  : config_(config), layer_(layer) {
54  DCHECK(layer_);
55 
56  voxel_size_ = layer_->voxel_size();
57  block_size_ = layer_->block_size();
58  voxels_per_side_ = layer_->voxels_per_side();
59 
60  voxel_size_inv_ = 1.0 / voxel_size_;
61  block_size_inv_ = 1.0 / block_size_;
62  voxels_per_side_inv_ = 1.0 / voxels_per_side_;
63 
64  if (config_.integrator_threads == 0) {
65  LOG(WARNING) << "Automatic core count failed, defaulting to 1 threads";
66  config_.integrator_threads = 1;
67  }
68  // clearing rays have no utility if voxel_carving is disabled
69  if (config_.allow_clear && !config_.voxel_carving_enabled) {
70  config_.allow_clear = false;
71  }
72 }
73 
74 // Thread safe.
75 inline bool TsdfIntegratorBase::isPointValid(const Point& point_C,
76  const bool point_in_freespace,
77  bool* is_clearing) const {
78  DCHECK(is_clearing != nullptr);
79  const FloatingPoint ray_distance = point_C.norm();
80  if (ray_distance < config_.min_ray_length_m) {
81  return false;
82  } else if (ray_distance > config_.max_ray_length_m) {
83  if (config_.allow_clear || point_in_freespace) {
84  *is_clearing = true;
85  return true;
86  } else {
87  return false;
88  }
89  } else {
90  *is_clearing = point_in_freespace;
91  return true;
92  }
93 }
94 
95 // Will return a pointer to a voxel located at global_voxel_idx in the tsdf
96 // layer. Thread safe.
97 // Takes in the last_block_idx and last_block to prevent unneeded map lookups.
98 // If the block this voxel would be in has not been allocated, a block in
99 // temp_block_map_ is created/accessed and a voxel from this map is returned
100 // instead. Unlike the layer, accessing temp_block_map_ is controlled via a
101 // mutex allowing it to grow during integration.
102 // These temporary blocks can be merged into the layer later by calling
103 // updateLayerWithStoredBlocks()
104 TsdfVoxel* TsdfIntegratorBase::allocateStorageAndGetVoxelPtr(
105  const GlobalIndex& global_voxel_idx, Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr* last_block,
106  BlockIndex* last_block_idx) {
107  DCHECK(last_block != nullptr);
108  DCHECK(last_block_idx != nullptr);
109 
110  const BlockIndex block_idx =
111  getBlockIndexFromGlobalVoxelIndex(global_voxel_idx, voxels_per_side_inv_);
112 
113  if ((block_idx != *last_block_idx) || (*last_block == nullptr)) {
114  *last_block = layer_->getBlockPtrByIndex(block_idx);
115  *last_block_idx = block_idx;
116  }
117 
118  // If no block at this location currently exists, we allocate a temporary
119  // voxel that will be merged into the map later
120  if (*last_block == nullptr) {
121  // To allow temp_block_map_ to grow we can only let one thread in at once
122  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(temp_block_mutex_);
123 
124  typename Layer<TsdfVoxel>::BlockHashMap::iterator it =
125  temp_block_map_.find(block_idx);
126  if (it != temp_block_map_.end()) {
127  *last_block = it->second;
128  } else {
129  auto insert_status = temp_block_map_.emplace(
130  block_idx, std::make_shared<Block<TsdfVoxel>>(
131  voxels_per_side_, voxel_size_,
132  getOriginPointFromGridIndex(block_idx, block_size_)));
133 
134  DCHECK(insert_status.second) << "Block already exists when allocating at "
135  << block_idx.transpose();
136 
137  *last_block = insert_status.first->second;
138  }
139  }
140 
141  (*last_block)->updated() = true;
142 
143  const VoxelIndex local_voxel_idx =
144  getLocalFromGlobalVoxelIndex(global_voxel_idx, voxels_per_side_);
145 
146  return &((*last_block)->getVoxelByVoxelIndex(local_voxel_idx));
147 }
148 
149 // NOT thread safe
150 void TsdfIntegratorBase::updateLayerWithStoredBlocks() {
151  BlockIndex last_block_idx;
152  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block = nullptr;
153 
154  for (const std::pair<const BlockIndex, Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr>&
155  temp_block_pair : temp_block_map_) {
156  layer_->insertBlock(temp_block_pair);
157  }
158 
159  temp_block_map_.clear();
160 }
161 
162 // Updates tsdf_voxel. Thread safe.
163 void TsdfIntegratorBase::updateTsdfVoxel(const Point& origin,
164  const Point& point_G,
165  const GlobalIndex& global_voxel_idx,
166  const Color& color, const float weight,
167  TsdfVoxel* tsdf_voxel) {
168  DCHECK(tsdf_voxel != nullptr);
169 
170  const Point voxel_center =
171  getCenterPointFromGridIndex(global_voxel_idx, voxel_size_);
172 
173  const float sdf = computeDistance(origin, point_G, voxel_center);
174 
175  float updated_weight = weight;
176  // Compute updated weight in case we use weight dropoff. It's easier here
177  // that in getVoxelWeight as here we have the actual SDF for the voxel
178  // already computed.
179  const FloatingPoint dropoff_epsilon = voxel_size_;
180  if (config_.use_weight_dropoff && sdf < -dropoff_epsilon) {
181  updated_weight = weight * (config_.default_truncation_distance + sdf) /
182  (config_.default_truncation_distance - dropoff_epsilon);
183  updated_weight = std::max(updated_weight, 0.0f);
184  }
185 
186  // Compute the updated weight in case we compensate for sparsity. By
187  // multiplicating the weight of occupied areas (|sdf| < truncation distance)
188  // by a factor, we prevent to easily fade out these areas with the free
189  // space parts of other rays which pass through the corresponding voxels.
190  // This can be useful for creating a TSDF map from sparse sensor data (e.g.
191  // visual features from a SLAM system). By default, this option is disabled.
192  if (config_.use_sparsity_compensation_factor) {
193  if (std::abs(sdf) < config_.default_truncation_distance) {
194  updated_weight *= config_.sparsity_compensation_factor;
195  }
196  }
197 
198  // Lookup the mutex that is responsible for this voxel and lock it
199  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(mutexes_.get(global_voxel_idx));
200 
201  const float new_weight = tsdf_voxel->weight + updated_weight;
202 
203  // it is possible to have weights very close to zero, due to the limited
204  // precision of floating points dividing by this small value can cause nans
205  if (new_weight < kFloatEpsilon) {
206  return;
207  }
208 
209  const float new_sdf =
210  (sdf * updated_weight + tsdf_voxel->distance * tsdf_voxel->weight) /
211  new_weight;
212 
213  // color blending is expensive only do it close to the surface
214  if (std::abs(sdf) < config_.default_truncation_distance) {
215  tsdf_voxel->color = Color::blendTwoColors(
216  tsdf_voxel->color, tsdf_voxel->weight, color, updated_weight);
217  }
218 
219  tsdf_voxel->distance =
220  (new_sdf > 0.0) ? std::min(config_.default_truncation_distance, new_sdf)
221  : std::max(-config_.default_truncation_distance, new_sdf);
222  tsdf_voxel->weight = std::min(config_.max_weight, new_weight);
223 }
224 
225 // Thread safe.
226 // Figure out whether the voxel is behind or in front of the surface.
227 // To do this, project the voxel_center onto the ray from origin to point G.
228 // Then check if the the magnitude of the vector is smaller or greater than
229 // the original distance...
230 float TsdfIntegratorBase::computeDistance(const Point& origin,
231  const Point& point_G,
232  const Point& voxel_center) const {
233  const Point v_voxel_origin = voxel_center - origin;
234  const Point v_point_origin = point_G - origin;
235 
236  const FloatingPoint dist_G = v_point_origin.norm();
237  // projection of a (v_voxel_origin) onto b (v_point_origin)
238  const FloatingPoint dist_G_V = v_voxel_origin.dot(v_point_origin) / dist_G;
239 
240  const float sdf = static_cast<float>(dist_G - dist_G_V);
241  return sdf;
242 }
243 
244 // Thread safe.
245 float TsdfIntegratorBase::getVoxelWeight(const Point& point_C) const {
246  if (config_.use_const_weight) {
247  return 1.0f;
248  }
249  const FloatingPoint dist_z = std::abs(point_C.z());
250  if (dist_z > kEpsilon) {
251  return 1.0f / (dist_z * dist_z);
252  }
253  return 0.0f;
254 }
255 
256 void SimpleTsdfIntegrator::integratePointCloud(const Transformation& T_G_C,
257  const Pointcloud& points_C,
258  const Colors& colors,
259  const bool freespace_points) {
260  timing::Timer integrate_timer("integrate/simple");
261  CHECK_EQ(points_C.size(), colors.size());
262  ThreadSafeIndex index_getter(points_C.size());
263 
264  std::list<std::thread> integration_threads;
265  for (size_t i = 0; i < config_.integrator_threads; ++i) {
266  integration_threads.emplace_back(&SimpleTsdfIntegrator::integrateFunction,
267  this, T_G_C, points_C, colors,
268  freespace_points, &index_getter);
269  }
270 
271  for (std::thread& thread : integration_threads) {
272  thread.join();
273  }
274  integrate_timer.Stop();
275 
276  timing::Timer insertion_timer("inserting_missed_blocks");
277  updateLayerWithStoredBlocks();
278  insertion_timer.Stop();
279 }
280 
281 void SimpleTsdfIntegrator::integrateFunction(const Transformation& T_G_C,
282  const Pointcloud& points_C,
283  const Colors& colors,
284  const bool freespace_points,
285  ThreadSafeIndex* index_getter) {
286  DCHECK(index_getter != nullptr);
287 
288  size_t point_idx;
289  while (index_getter->getNextIndex(&point_idx)) {
290  const Point& point_C = points_C[point_idx];
291  const Color& color = colors[point_idx];
292  bool is_clearing;
293  if (!isPointValid(point_C, freespace_points, &is_clearing)) {
294  continue;
295  }
296 
297  const Point origin = T_G_C.getPosition();
298  const Point point_G = T_G_C * point_C;
299 
300  RayCaster ray_caster(origin, point_G, is_clearing,
301  config_.voxel_carving_enabled,
302  config_.max_ray_length_m, voxel_size_inv_,
303  config_.default_truncation_distance);
304 
305  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block = nullptr;
306  BlockIndex block_idx;
307  GlobalIndex global_voxel_idx;
308  while (ray_caster.nextRayIndex(&global_voxel_idx)) {
309  TsdfVoxel* voxel =
310  allocateStorageAndGetVoxelPtr(global_voxel_idx, &block, &block_idx);
311 
312  const float weight = getVoxelWeight(point_C);
313 
314  updateTsdfVoxel(origin, point_G, global_voxel_idx, color, weight, voxel);
315  }
316  }
317 }
318 
319 void MergedTsdfIntegrator::integratePointCloud(const Transformation& T_G_C,
320  const Pointcloud& points_C,
321  const Colors& colors,
322  const bool freespace_points) {
323  timing::Timer integrate_timer("integrate/merged");
324  CHECK_EQ(points_C.size(), colors.size());
325 
326  // Pre-compute a list of unique voxels to end on.
327  // Create a hashmap: VOXEL INDEX -> index in original cloud.
328  LongIndexHashMapType<AlignedVector<size_t>>::type voxel_map;
329  // This is a hash map (same as above) to all the indices that need to be
330  // cleared.
331  LongIndexHashMapType<AlignedVector<size_t>>::type clear_map;
332 
333  ThreadSafeIndex index_getter(points_C.size());
334 
335  bundleRays(T_G_C, points_C, freespace_points, &index_getter, &voxel_map,
336  &clear_map);
337 
338  integrateRays(T_G_C, points_C, colors, config_.enable_anti_grazing, false,
339  voxel_map, clear_map);
340 
341  timing::Timer clear_timer("integrate/clear");
342 
343  integrateRays(T_G_C, points_C, colors, config_.enable_anti_grazing, true,
344  voxel_map, clear_map);
345 
346  clear_timer.Stop();
347 
348  integrate_timer.Stop();
349 }
350 
351 void MergedTsdfIntegrator::bundleRays(
352  const Transformation& T_G_C, const Pointcloud& points_C,
353  const bool freespace_points, ThreadSafeIndex* index_getter,
354  LongIndexHashMapType<AlignedVector<size_t>>::type* voxel_map,
355  LongIndexHashMapType<AlignedVector<size_t>>::type* clear_map) {
356  DCHECK(voxel_map != nullptr);
357  DCHECK(clear_map != nullptr);
358 
359  size_t point_idx;
360  while (index_getter->getNextIndex(&point_idx)) {
361  const Point& point_C = points_C[point_idx];
362  bool is_clearing;
363  if (!isPointValid(point_C, freespace_points, &is_clearing)) {
364  continue;
365  }
366 
367  const Point point_G = T_G_C * point_C;
368 
369  GlobalIndex voxel_index =
370  getGridIndexFromPoint<GlobalIndex>(point_G, voxel_size_inv_);
371 
372  if (is_clearing) {
373  (*clear_map)[voxel_index].push_back(point_idx);
374  } else {
375  (*voxel_map)[voxel_index].push_back(point_idx);
376  }
377  }
378 
379  VLOG(3) << "Went from " << points_C.size() << " points to "
380  << voxel_map->size() << " raycasts and " << clear_map->size()
381  << " clear rays.";
382 }
383 
384 void MergedTsdfIntegrator::integrateVoxel(
385  const Transformation& T_G_C, const Pointcloud& points_C,
386  const Colors& colors, bool enable_anti_grazing, bool clearing_ray,
387  const std::pair<GlobalIndex, AlignedVector<size_t>>& kv,
388  const LongIndexHashMapType<AlignedVector<size_t>>::type& voxel_map) {
389  if (kv.second.empty()) {
390  return;
391  }
392 
393  const Point& origin = T_G_C.getPosition();
394  Color merged_color;
395  Point merged_point_C = Point::Zero();
396  FloatingPoint merged_weight = 0.0;
397 
398  for (const size_t pt_idx : kv.second) {
399  const Point& point_C = points_C[pt_idx];
400  const Color& color = colors[pt_idx];
401 
402  const float point_weight = getVoxelWeight(point_C);
403  if (point_weight < kEpsilon) {
404  continue;
405  }
406  merged_point_C = (merged_point_C * merged_weight + point_C * point_weight) /
407  (merged_weight + point_weight);
408  merged_color =
409  Color::blendTwoColors(merged_color, merged_weight, color, point_weight);
410  merged_weight += point_weight;
411 
412  // only take first point when clearing
413  if (clearing_ray) {
414  break;
415  }
416  }
417 
418  const Point merged_point_G = T_G_C * merged_point_C;
419 
420  RayCaster ray_caster(origin, merged_point_G, clearing_ray,
421  config_.voxel_carving_enabled, config_.max_ray_length_m,
422  voxel_size_inv_, config_.default_truncation_distance);
423 
424  GlobalIndex global_voxel_idx;
425  while (ray_caster.nextRayIndex(&global_voxel_idx)) {
426  if (enable_anti_grazing) {
427  // Check if this one is already the the block hash map for this
428  // insertion. Skip this to avoid grazing.
429  if ((clearing_ray || global_voxel_idx != kv.first) &&
430  voxel_map.find(global_voxel_idx) != voxel_map.end()) {
431  continue;
432  }
433  }
434 
435  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block = nullptr;
436  BlockIndex block_idx;
437  TsdfVoxel* voxel =
438  allocateStorageAndGetVoxelPtr(global_voxel_idx, &block, &block_idx);
439 
440  updateTsdfVoxel(origin, merged_point_G, global_voxel_idx, merged_color,
441  merged_weight, voxel);
442  }
443 }
444 
445 void MergedTsdfIntegrator::integrateVoxels(
446  const Transformation& T_G_C, const Pointcloud& points_C,
447  const Colors& colors, bool enable_anti_grazing, bool clearing_ray,
448  const LongIndexHashMapType<AlignedVector<size_t>>::type& voxel_map,
449  const LongIndexHashMapType<AlignedVector<size_t>>::type& clear_map,
450  size_t thread_idx) {
451  LongIndexHashMapType<AlignedVector<size_t>>::type::const_iterator it;
452  size_t map_size;
453  if (clearing_ray) {
454  it = clear_map.begin();
455  map_size = clear_map.size();
456  } else {
457  it = voxel_map.begin();
458  map_size = voxel_map.size();
459  }
460 
461  for (size_t i = 0; i < map_size; ++i) {
462  if (((i + thread_idx + 1) % config_.integrator_threads) == 0) {
463  integrateVoxel(T_G_C, points_C, colors, enable_anti_grazing, clearing_ray,
464  *it, voxel_map);
465  }
466  ++it;
467  }
468 }
469 
470 void MergedTsdfIntegrator::integrateRays(
471  const Transformation& T_G_C, const Pointcloud& points_C,
472  const Colors& colors, bool enable_anti_grazing, bool clearing_ray,
473  const LongIndexHashMapType<AlignedVector<size_t>>::type& voxel_map,
474  const LongIndexHashMapType<AlignedVector<size_t>>::type& clear_map) {
475  // if only 1 thread just do function call, otherwise spawn threads
476  if (config_.integrator_threads == 1) {
477  constexpr size_t thread_idx = 0;
478  integrateVoxels(T_G_C, points_C, colors, enable_anti_grazing, clearing_ray,
479  voxel_map, clear_map, thread_idx);
480  } else {
481  std::list<std::thread> integration_threads;
482  for (size_t i = 0; i < config_.integrator_threads; ++i) {
483  integration_threads.emplace_back(
484  &MergedTsdfIntegrator::integrateVoxels, this, T_G_C, points_C, colors,
485  enable_anti_grazing, clearing_ray, voxel_map, clear_map, i);
486  }
487 
488  for (std::thread& thread : integration_threads) {
489  thread.join();
490  }
491  }
492 
493  timing::Timer insertion_timer("inserting_missed_blocks");
494  updateLayerWithStoredBlocks();
495 
496  insertion_timer.Stop();
497 }
498 
499 void FastTsdfIntegrator::integrateFunction(const Transformation& T_G_C,
500  const Pointcloud& points_C,
501  const Colors& colors,
502  const bool freespace_points,
503  ThreadSafeIndex* index_getter) {
504  DCHECK(index_getter != nullptr);
505 
506  size_t point_idx;
507  while (index_getter->getNextIndex(&point_idx) &&
508  (std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::microseconds>(
509  std::chrono::steady_clock::now() - integration_start_time_)
510  .count() < config_.max_integration_time_s * 1000000)) {
511  const Point& point_C = points_C[point_idx];
512  const Color& color = colors[point_idx];
513  bool is_clearing;
514  if (!isPointValid(point_C, freespace_points, &is_clearing)) {
515  continue;
516  }
517 
518  const Point origin = T_G_C.getPosition();
519  const Point point_G = T_G_C * point_C;
520  // Checks to see if another ray in this scan has already started 'close' to
521  // this location. If it has then we skip ray casting this point. We measure
522  // if a start location is 'close' to another points by inserting the point
523  // into a set of voxels. This voxel set has a resolution
524  // start_voxel_subsampling_factor times higher then the voxel size.
525  GlobalIndex global_voxel_idx;
526  global_voxel_idx = getGridIndexFromPoint<GlobalIndex>(
527  point_G, config_.start_voxel_subsampling_factor * voxel_size_inv_);
528  if (!start_voxel_approx_set_.replaceHash(global_voxel_idx)) {
529  continue;
530  }
531 
532  constexpr bool cast_from_origin = false;
533  RayCaster ray_caster(origin, point_G, is_clearing,
534  config_.voxel_carving_enabled,
535  config_.max_ray_length_m, voxel_size_inv_,
536  config_.default_truncation_distance, cast_from_origin);
537 
538  int64_t consecutive_ray_collisions = 0;
539 
540  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block = nullptr;
541  BlockIndex block_idx;
542  while (ray_caster.nextRayIndex(&global_voxel_idx)) {
543  // Check if the current voxel has been seen by any ray cast this scan. If
544  // it has increment the consecutive_ray_collisions counter, otherwise
545  // reset it. If the counter reaches a threshold we stop casting as the ray
546  // is deemed to be contributing too little new information.
547  if (!voxel_observed_approx_set_.replaceHash(global_voxel_idx)) {
548  ++consecutive_ray_collisions;
549  } else {
550  consecutive_ray_collisions = 0;
551  }
552  if (consecutive_ray_collisions > config_.max_consecutive_ray_collisions) {
553  break;
554  }
555 
556  TsdfVoxel* voxel =
557  allocateStorageAndGetVoxelPtr(global_voxel_idx, &block, &block_idx);
558 
559  const float weight = getVoxelWeight(point_C);
560 
561  updateTsdfVoxel(origin, point_G, global_voxel_idx, color, weight, voxel);
562  }
563  }
564 }
565 
566 void FastTsdfIntegrator::integratePointCloud(const Transformation& T_G_C,
567  const Pointcloud& points_C,
568  const Colors& colors,
569  const bool freespace_points) {
570  timing::Timer integrate_timer("integrate/fast");
571  CHECK_EQ(points_C.size(), colors.size());
572 
573  integration_start_time_ = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
574 
575  static int64_t reset_counter = 0;
576  if ((++reset_counter) >= config_.clear_checks_every_n_frames) {
577  reset_counter = 0;
578  start_voxel_approx_set_.resetApproxSet();
579  voxel_observed_approx_set_.resetApproxSet();
580  }
581 
582  ThreadSafeIndex index_getter(points_C.size());
583 
584  std::list<std::thread> integration_threads;
585  for (size_t i = 0; i < config_.integrator_threads; ++i) {
586  integration_threads.emplace_back(&FastTsdfIntegrator::integrateFunction,
587  this, T_G_C, points_C, colors,
588  freespace_points, &index_getter);
589  }
590 
591  for (std::thread& thread : integration_threads) {
592  thread.join();
593  }
594 
595  integrate_timer.Stop();
596 
597  timing::Timer insertion_timer("inserting_missed_blocks");
598  updateLayerWithStoredBlocks();
599  insertion_timer.Stop();
600 }
601 
602 } // namespace voxblox
